Posts.Title: Breast Implants and Mammogram?? CoastieWife CoastieWife

Posts.Content: CoastieWife wrote: I am 26 and found a lump while doing a self breast exam. My doc wants me to have a mammogram and an ultrasound of the lump. I have silicone breast implants and I'm afraid of having my mammogram because i've never had one before and i'm scared of my implant rupturing. Anyone else out there with implants that can tell me what to expect and ease my nerves?? thanks!! Log in to post a reply
